name: schedule
description: The schedule table contains details of when a service or location is open. Entries are RFC 5545 RRULES.

id.name: id
id.description: Each entry must have a unique identifier

service_id.name: service_id
service_id.description: The identifier of the service for which this is the regular schedule

location_id.name: location_id
location_id.description: The identifier of the location for which this is the regular schedule

service_at_location_id.name: service_at_location_id
service_at_location_id.description: The identifier of the ‘service at location’ table entry, when this schedule is specific to a service in a particular location.

valid_from.name: valid_from
valid_from.description: The date from which the schedule information is valid.

valid_to.name: valid_to
valid_to.description: The last date on which the schedule information is valid.

dtstart.name: dtstart
dtstart.description: iCal - The date of the first event is the schedule. Necessary when using the ‘interval’ feature, optional otherwise.

timezone.name: timezone
timezone.description: The timezone that all dates are expressed as, expressed as a UTC offset. Dates are assumed to be UTC otherwise.

until.name: until
until.description: iCal - The date of the last occurence of the recurring event.

count.name: count
count.description: iCal - The number of times that the event occurs. Use this instead of ‘until’, if appropriate.

wkst.name: wkst
wkst.description: iCal - The day on which the week starts, eg MO.

freq.name: freq
freq.description: iCal - How often the frequency repeats. E.g. Frequency use one of WEEKLY or MONTHLY.

interval.name: interval
interval.description: iCal - How often the frequency repeats. E.g. Interval 2 for Frequency WEEKLY gives Fortnightly

byday.name: byday
byday.description: iCal - Comma seperated days of the week. E.g. SU,MO,TU,WE,TH,FR,SA. Where freq is MONTHLY each part can be preceded by a positive or negative integer to represent which occurrence in a month; e.g. 2MO is the second Monday in a month. -1FR is the last Friday

byweekno.name: byweekno
byweekno.description: iCal - Comma seperated numeric weeks of the year if freq is WEEKLY. Can be negative to represent weeks before the end of the year; e.g. -5 is the 5th to last week in a year.

bymonthday.name: bymonthday
bymonthday.description: iCal - Comma separated numeric days of the month if frequency is MONTHLY. Can be negative to represent days before the end of the month; e.g. -5 is the 5th to last day in a month.

byyearday.name: byyearday
byyearday.description: iCal - Comma separated numeric days of the month if frequency is YEARLY. Can be negative to represent days before the end of the year; e.g. -1 is the last day in a year.

description.name: description
description.description: Human readable description of the availability of the service.

opens_at.name: opens_at
opens_at.description: The time when a service or location opens. This should use HH:MM format and should include timezone information, either adding the suffix ‘Z’ when the date is in UTC, or including an offset from UTC (e.g. 09:00-05:00 for 9am EST.)

closes_at.name: closes_at
closes_at.description: The time when a service or location closes. This should use HH:MM format and should include timezone information, either adding the suffix ‘Z’ when the date is in UTC, or including an offset from UTC (e.g. 09:00-05:00 for 9am EST.)

schedule_link.name: schedule_link
schedule_link.description: URL of a link for the scheule which may show each individual session and may provide a booking facility

attending_type.name: attending_type
attending_type.description:
How to attend this service.

Application Profile Notes: Expected to reference a taxonomy ratehr than an enumeration in future versions

notes.name: notes
notes.description: Human readable notes on the schedule
